name: lsmunss

stmt.origin: unssd(c0, c2, co(c0, c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1))))

comment: Union of subgroups is a subset of subgroup sum. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2014.)
